channel.title: A Proper wow server ~ WOrld of warcraft private server ~ Antrex
channel.description:
i took this from a tutorial i mate of mine wrote it i gave him a hand with all the dumps and mysql , + finding some files so i could post it he said to save me writing one all most the same just with spelling errors lol
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] [COLOR=DarkOrange][U][B][SIZE=5]Downloads:[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] [COLOR=YellowGreen][U][B][SIZE=3]Julianx's Repack V2 (Updated)[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://files.filefront.com/Julianxs+Repack+V2+updatedrar/;8057453;;/fileinfo.html"]Filefront[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=TJ1MA502"]MegaUpload[/URL] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/85080cd232f933f1741c14da19345bb9"]Filebeam[/URL]
[U][B]This Repack Includes:[/B][/U] 1. Rev 707 (named it Julianx's Repack) 2. sql Files[INDENT] a) TNPS7 DB (updated) b) Black Temple loot Updates c) Frosthold WoW GM armor sets d) Custom Shops 2.5 e) Missing Rev7 Items f) Portals for all main cities g) Missing Tables [/INDENT]3. DBC 4. Map Extractor (instructions on use inside) 5. Ecko Tools 6. Script_bin 7. exe's 8. .Conf Files
[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3][U][B]Cool CMS V.1.1 (JulianX Images)[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/17e0231fb65b4fa54f2205a156608665"]Filebeam[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=RJBXEU1M"]MegaUpload[/URL] [URL=http://"http://files.filefront.com/Cool+CMS+V11+JulianX+Imszip/;8057593;;/fileinfo.html"]Filefront[/URL]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][B][U][SIZE=3]MySQL and SQLyog[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://files.filefront.com/MySQL+504+and+SQLyog+64rar/;8057465;;/fileinfo.html"]Filefront[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=L75X6KQ1"]MegaUpload[/URL] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/63ab5c599dc9d32867448e2a712eb638"]Filebeam[/URL]
[B][U]File Details:[/U][/B] 1. MySQL 5.0.4 2. SQLyog 6.04 [COLOR=YellowGreen] [U][B][SIZE=3]All In 1 Pack[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=GO7KEU69"]MegaUpload[/URL]
[U][B]All in 1 Pack Details:[/B][/U] 1. Julianx's Repack (updated) 2. Cool CMS V.1.1 (JulianX Images) 3. MySQL and SQLyog
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] [COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5][U][B]Extra Downloads[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR] [COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] [COLOR=YellowGreen][U][B][SIZE=3]Hyjal/BT Updates/fixes:[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/51cd888ea80328ba4b1d901a5321e8cb"]Filebeam[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.megaupload.com/?d=X5DMNXXK"]MegaUpload[/URL] [URL=http://"http://files.filefront.com/Instance+Updatesrar/;8057646;;/fileinfo.html"]Filefront[/URL]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][U][B][SIZE=3]Fix Pack V1[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/f538f135269c175b8956a7107ce22657"]Filebeam[/URL] [URL=http://"http://files.filefront.com/Fixs+Pack+V1rar/;8098328;;/fileinfo.html"]Filefront[/URL]
[U][B]Fix Details[/B][/U] 2.2. Patch Items Azuremyst Isle HP/MP fix A threat Within Quest Fix Blade Esdge Mountains Quest ID's fix Kobold Emote Hinterland Fixes Mob Fixes More Mob Fixes Fire Totem Fixes Dwarf Hunter Quest fix Drywallow Daggermaw fix Design: Sovereign Shadowsong Amethyst item patch Crag Boar Update Mobs table update Orphan Matron Nightingale fix Proper Items Sheath fix Quest Updates #1 Table Clean-ups Terrokar Forest Quest ID fixes Too many items fix Warglaives Fix Zangamarsh Quest ID fixes Vendor Table Updates (takes a while to execute 5 minutes or more)
[COLOR=YellowGreen][B][U][SIZE=3]All in 1 Fix Pack V1[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/7eec82c6a12139f06d39aa0cccb1a7fe"]Filebeam[/URL] [URL=http://"http://files.filefront.com/All+in+1+fixs+V1rar/;8098334;;/fileinfo.html"]Filefront[/URL]
[U][B]All in 1 Details[/B][/U] All of the fixes in Fix Pack V1 but in all together in 1 sql file. [COLOR=Orange][SIZE=2][B]NOTE: this is important at about the nd your PC will freeze and slow down, do not think there is a problem. This SQL file takes about 10 minutes to execute, but it is worth it.[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][B][U][SIZE=3]Illidan and Akama Update[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://emupedia.com/forums/showthread.php?t=10932&highlight=illidan"]Emupedia[/URL]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][U][B][SIZE=3]Antrix Rev 885[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/8f41bb45aa065e1cc880d0384816bf66"]Filebeam[/URL]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][U][B][SIZE=3]Map Extractor's[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/7b7a4d48defb7d6da290dfde3da2869a"]enGB extractor[/URL] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/c1d88fffe3284c1167b9dffb262297fd"]enUS extractor[/URL] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/3b1159f8d839f5768913bee55ebeac20"]deDE extractor[/URL] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/9170cd15a0bca5ac349ea9bd1adcead1"]frFR extractor[/URL] [URL=http://"http://filebeam.com/0ed745d9f84c777a64bfef069a653bda"]spSP extractor[/URL]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] [COLOR=DarkOrange][U][B][SIZE=5]Map Extracting:[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] 1) Open Julianx's Repack-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Step1.jpg"]Image[/URL] 2) Select and open the file "map_extractor"-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Step2.jpg"]Image[/URL] 3) select ad.exe-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Step3.jpg"]Image[/URL] 4) Open up WoW directory folder and put ad.exe in there-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/step4.jpg"]Image[/URL] 5) Create a new Folder in your WoW Folder......[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Step5.jpg"]Image[/URL] 6) Name the folder "maps"-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Step6.jpg"]Image[/URL] 7) This is what the layout SHOULD look like-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Step7.jpg"]Image[/URL] 8) Open the maps file....as you can see it is empty atm, so go back to the WoW folder-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/maps.jpg"]Image[/URL] 9) When back in WoW folder start up the ad.exe, it should look like this when started.-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Step8.jpg"]Image[/URL] 10) Now when it finishes, the exe will disappear and you might think you have had an error, but you prolly didn'y, you did if it disspeared within 30 seconds cuz this process should take about 5 minutes. 11) Now open up your "maps" folder in your WoW directory, and you will see a bunch of map documents like in the pic.-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/finishedmaps.jpg"]Image[/URL] 12) Now that this is all done put the "maps" folder into the folder called "Julianx's repack", which will look like this when put in.-[URL=http://"http://i174.photobucket.com/albums/w114/Julian121/Untitled-4.jpg"]Image[/URL]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] [COLOR=DarkOrange][U][B][SIZE=5]Server Set-up Guide:[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] [COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR] [COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3][U][B]****Step 1: Setting up MySQL****[/B][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR] 1) Open the MySQL 5.0.41 Essentials installer and click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_1.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 2) Choose "Typical" and click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_2.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 3) Click "Install"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_3.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 4) After installation, click "Next" twice, till the last tab of this wizard.-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_4.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 5) Check the option "Configure the MySQL Server now" and click "Finish"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_5.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 6) Just click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_6.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 7) Choose "Standard Configuration" and click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_7.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 8) Check the options "Install As Windows Service" and "Launch the MySQL Service automatically", then click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_8.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 9) Check "Modify Security Settings" and create a password, then click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_9.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 10) Just click "Execute"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_10.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 11) Check that everything gone well and then click "Finish"[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_11.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][U][B][SIZE=3]****Step 2: Setting up SQLyog****[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR] 1) Start the SQLyog Comunity 6.04 installer and click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_a.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 2) Check "I accept the terms in the License Agreement", then click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_b.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 3) Select your favorite options, then click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_c.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 4) Choose a folder, then click "Install"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_d.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 5) Wait until the setup is completed succesfully, then click "Next"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_e.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 6)Check "Run SQLyog Comunity 6.04" and click "Finish"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_f.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 7) Just click "Continue..."-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_g.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 8) Fill the Password cell with your MySQL root password (the password is the one you used during MySQL 5.0.41 Essentials configuration), then click "Connect"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_h.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 9) Agree and save your password in SQLyog connection manager-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_i.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 10) Right click on "root@localhost" and select "Create Database..."-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_j.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 11) Put "antrix" (without quotes) and click "Create"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_k.jpg/view/"]Image [/URL] 12) Right click on "antrix" and select "Restore From SQL Dump..."-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_l.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 13) Browse your "sql" folder and select the database "TNPS7". Click "Open" then "Execute"- [URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_m_1.jpg/view/"]Image 1[/URL] [URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_m_2.jpg/view/"]Image 2[/URL] [COLOR=Orange][B][U][SIZE=2]NOTE: This will not take as long as other DB's it will be ready in 1-3 minutes tops.[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR] 14) Again, Right click on "antrix" and select "Restore From SQL Dump..."-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_a.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 15) Browse your "sql" folder and select the file "Missing Tables.sql". Click "open" then "Execute" [URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_o_1.jpg/view/"]Image 1[/URL] [URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_o_2.jpg/view/"]Image 2[/URL] 16) When the import is completed successfully, click "Close"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_p.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 17) Click on "Refresh Object Browser" , then select "accounts" table in your "antrix" database. Now click on "Table Data" and you will see your "accounts" table data. [URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_q_1.jpg/view/"]Image 1[/URL] [URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_q_2.jpg/view/"]Image 2[/URL] [URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_q_3.jpg/view/"]Image 3[/URL] 18) Fill the cells to whatever you want your acct to be. To make TBC go to very end of cells and change the flags to 8. To make self GM enter "az" into the GM cell. then click "Save Changes"-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_r.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL] 19) Close SQLyog Comunity 6.04-[URL=http://"http://s2.supload.com/free/Step_S.jpg/view/"]Image[/URL]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][B][U][SIZE=3]****Step 3: Config Files****[/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR]
Change all Written in [B][U][COLOR=Red]red[/COLOR][/U][/B], to your info.

item.title: A Proper wow server ~ WOrld of warcraft private server ~ Antrex
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

b) Logonserver.Conf
CODE:

[code]#######################################################################

Antrix Realms Configuration File

Last updated at revision 446 by Burlex

#######################################################################

/********************************************************************************

  • How to use this config file: *
  • Config files are in a block->variable->setting format. *
  • A < signifies the opening of a block, the block name is expected after that. *
  • After the block name, a space and then the settings sperated by = / ’ '. *
  •                                                                          *
  • e.g. *
  • *
  •                                                                          *
  • Comments can be in C format, e.g. /* some stuff */, with a // at the start *
  • of the line, or in shell format (#). *
    ********************************************************************************/

LogonDatabase Section

These directives are the location of the realms and accounts

tables.

LogonDatabase.Host - The hostname that the database is located on

LogonDatabase.Username - The username used for the mysql connection

LogonDatabase.Password - The password used for the mysql connection

LogonDatabase.Name - The database name

LogonDatabase.Port - Port that MySQL listens on. Usually 3306.

LogonDatabase.Type - Client to use. 1 = MySQL, 2 = PostgreSQL, 3 = Oracle 10g

Host Directive

This is the address that the realmlist will listen on.

To listen on all addresses, set it to 0.0.0.0

Default: 127.0.0.1 (localhost)

Note: ISHost is the interserver communication listener.

Server console logging level

This directive controls how much output the server will

display in it’s console. Set to 0 for none.

0 = Minimum; 1 = Error; 2 = Detail; 3 = Full/Debug

Default: 3

Account Refresh Time

This controls on which time interval accounts gets

refreshed. (In seconds)

Default = 600

Accepted Build Range Setup

These two directives set up which clients will be

allowed to authenticate with the realm list.

Set these to the same builds that the server was

compiled for.

As of the last update, version 2.1.1 was build 6739.

WorldServer Setup

This directive controls the password used to authenticate with the worldserver.

It must be the same between the two configs. If it is not, your server will

not register.

Default: “change_me_logon”

[/code]c)Realms.conf
CODE:

[code]#######################################################################

Antrix Realms Configuration File

Last updated at revision 446 by Burlex

#######################################################################

/********************************************************************************

  • How to use this config file: *
  • Config files are in a block->variable->setting format. *
  • A < signifies the opening of a block, the block name is expected after that. *
  • After the block name, a space and then the settings sperated by = / ’ '. *
  •                                                                          *
  • e.g. *
  • *
  •                                                                          *
  • Comments can be in C format, e.g. /* some stuff */, with a // at the start *
  • of the line, or in shell format (#). *
    ********************************************************************************/

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

LogonServer Section

Address:

The address (no port) of the server.

Port:

The port on which the logon server listens. (*** NOT 3724 ***)

Name:

Not really relavant, but name the logon.

RealmCount:

The number of realms in the next section.

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Realm Section

Name:

The name of the realm.

Address:

The address (and port) of that realm.

Icon:

The type of realm (PVP, Normal, RPPVP, RP)

Colour:

Realm colour in realm list display.

TimeZone:

Time zone the realm is in.

Population:

(0 = low, 1 = medium, 2 = high)

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#


[/code][COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5]Making Server Public:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Step 1: Creating A Dynamic Domain Name[/SIZE][/COLOR]

  1. Go to DynDNS.com and register an account.-Image
  2. Once your able to log in, goto the Tab ‘Services’ on top.-Image
  3. To your right you’ll see ‘Create Dynamic DNS Host’, click that.-Image
    [INDENT]
  4. Host Name: Can be whatever you want
  5. IP Address: Usually auto populated but if not, go to My External IP and copy that there.
    3)Check enable wildcard.
  6. Mail Exchanger: I doubt you have this considering your looking at this guide for help. Leave blank.
  7. Click on ‘Add Host’
    [/INDENT]4) Now click this link and download DynDNS Updater, I would set it up as as a service, but it doesn’t matter.

[COLOR=Orange]If you have issues setting up DynDNS Updater or No-Ip Updater post what you don’t get in detail and I will help you.[/COLOR]

[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Step 2: Antrix Preparation[/SIZE][/COLOR]

  1. Goto [B]\system32\drivers\etc[/B] and open the file called ‘host’ with notepad. (replace with the location of your windows folder… i.e. c:\windows\system32\drivers\etc)
    Image 1
    Image 2
    Image 3
    Image 5
    Image 6
    Imge 7

  2. Once open it should look like something this…-Image
    (Without the added host)
    With the added host it looks like…-Image

  3. Save and close
    d)Open up SQLyog and click on Connection, and change it from Localhost to your DNS hostname that you made before whcih will look like this when added…-Image

  4. Click OK and your done with setting up SQLyog
    [COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]
    Step 3: Router Configurations*
    [/SIZE][/COLOR]
    If you have some generic router that for some reason only allows you to forward one port i can’t help you. Throw it away and get a good router. And don’t try to do this stuff wirelessly, because that’s a whole nother set of issues and why you’d want to do that is beyond me.

To access your router, enter 192.168.1.1 in your Webbrowser.

  1. Disable Port Triggering if you have the option. If not, just don’t use it becuase it’s an advanced feature that you need to know what it’s for in order for it to work properly.
  2. The following ports need to be opened and pointing to your servers router assigned IP address.
  • [COLOR=#ff8c00]3724 TCP[/COLOR](Enables you to connect to the Realmd DB) This port will give you the “Unable to connect” Message if not forwarded to your server.
  • [COLOR=#ff8c00]8085 TCP [/COLOR](Enables you to connect to the WorldServer) This port is what causes realm looping if not pointing to your server IP and has the wrong protocol. Simply because you can’t log into the mangos server so it kicks you back to the realmd server (realm list).-
  • [COLOR=#ff8c00]80 TCP[/COLOR](This is only needed if your hosting a website frontend on the same server)
  • [COLOR=#ff0000]3306 TCP[/COLOR](This allows connection to your DB in MySQL)
    [COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]
    Step 4: Setting up your Client to Connect to your server[/SIZE]    [/COLOR]
  1. Go into your WorldofWarcraft game directory. Example c:\WorldofWarcraft\
  2. Open the file realmlist.wtf with notepad.
  3. Replace us.logon.worldofwarcraft.com with so it should look like this:set realmlist frosthold.servegame.org (or of course your DNS hostname)4) Save and close.
    [COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]
    Step 5: Your done, time for some Q/A[/SIZE]    [/COLOR]

Q. What is my DB username and password?
A. Depends on what repak your using and how you set up mysql. If your using repaks that come with mysql then it’s usually mangos, mangos by default. If you setup mysql yourself, well then I couldn’t tell ya.

Q. I have a static IP address from my ISP, how do i get it to work with that?
A. Use the Static host name instead of Dynamic and you do not need dynamic updater.

Q. Does this work with a DLINK router?
A. Not from my experience.

Q. Its possible my antivirus blocking my ports?
A. Yes some antivirus programs can do that.

Q. Do i need to configure my firewall as well by forwarding the same ports?
A. Most firewalls will automatically set this up for you the first time you use the app and try to access the net or access it from another computer. But if it hasn’t then yes you do.

Q. Which IP should you use with forwarding ports your static, lan, or wan ip? or dns server ip ?
A. LAN

Q. What if i can’t get access to my router to forward the ports?
A. Then you’ll need to use Hamachi.

[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5]Setting Up Website:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=YellowGreen]
[SIZE=3]Step 1: Getting PHP software (WAMP)[/SIZE][/COLOR]

  1. DOWNLOAD WAMP
  2. Install WAMP
    [COLOR=YellowGreen]
    [SIZE=3]Step 2: Extracting Website/Editing Files[/SIZE][/COLOR]
  3. Extract all files in Cool CMS v1.1(Julianx Images) to the www folder in the WAMP directory replacing old 1’s.
  4. Edit the Config file: (change info written in [COLOR=Red]red[/COLOR] to your info)

<?php $db="[SIZE=2][B][U][COLOR=Red]Name of Database[/COLOR][/U][/B][/SIZE]"; $dbuser="[SIZE=2][COLOR=Red][B][U]MySQl Username[/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]"; $dbpass="[SIZE=2][B][U][COLOR=Red]MySQL Password[/COLOR][/U][/B][/SIZE]"; $dbhost="[size=2][COLOR=Red][B][U]Database HostAddress[/U][/B][/COLOR]"; ?>c) Also Edit the Realmlist file in “Files” folder in the www Directory:

set realmlist [SIZE=2][B][U][COLOR=Red]Database Host Address[/COLOR][/U][/B][/SIZE]

Step 3: Putting WAMP online[/SIZE][/B][/U][/COLOR]

  1. Now that that is all done, go to WAMP and make sure you click the button “Put Online”
  2. Your all Done now see if others can connect to the site.

[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5]-~=Credits=~-[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]

bout 20% me and 80% julz

[COLOR=DarkGreen][SIZE=4]HOPE THIS GUIDE HELPED SOMEONE[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Read full topic
item.source: A Proper wow server ~ WOrld of warcraft private server ~ Antrex

item.title: A Proper wow server ~ WOrld of warcraft private server ~ Antrex
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

a) Antrix.conf
CODE:

[code]#######################################################################

Antrix Configuration File

Last updated at revision 446 by Burlex

#######################################################################

/********************************************************************************

  • How to use this config file: *
  • Config files are in a block->variable->setting format. *
  • A < signifies the opening of a block, the block name is expected after that. *
  • After the block name, a space and then the settings sperated by = / ’ '. *
  •                                                                          *
  • e.g. *
  • *
  •                                                                          *
  • Comments can be in C format, e.g. /* some stuff */, with a // at the start *
  • of the line, or in shell format (#). *
    ********************************************************************************/

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Database Section

Database.Host - The hostname that the database is located on

Database.Username - The username used for the mysql connection

Database.Password - The password used for the mysql connection

Database.Name - The database name

Database.Port - Port that MySQL listens on. Usually 3306.

Database.Type - Client to use. 1 = MySQL, 2 = PostgreSQL, 3 = Oracle 10g

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Listen Config

Host

This is the address that the server will listen on.

To listen on all addresses, set it to 0.0.0.0

Default: 127.0.0.1 (localhost)

WorldServerPort

This is the port that the world server listens on.

It has to be the same as what is specified in the

realms table in the LogonDatabase.

Default: 8129

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Log Level Setup

Console Logging Level

This directive controls how much output the server will

display in it’s console. Set to 0 for none, or -1 to disable.

-1 = Disabled; 0 = Minimum; 1 = Error; 2 = Detail; 3 = Full/Debug

Default: 3

World server packet logging feature

If this directive is turned on, a file called world.log

will be created in the server’s directory and all packets

sent and received by clients will be dumped here in bfg

format.

Default: 0

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Server Settings

PlayerLimit

This directive controls the amount of sessions that will be

accepted by the server before it starts to add people to

the server queue.

Default: 100

PlrUpdateDistance

This directive controls the distance (internal yards) that the player can “see” up to

and receieve updates for. For smaller servers, you can probably increase this number.

Increasing this number will also increase the servers bandwidth consumption and CPU usage.

Default: 80

Motd

This message will be displayed by the server in the chat

box every time any user logs on. Colors can be used in the

standard WoW format.

Default: "No MOTD specified

Send Build On Join

This directive controls whether the server’s internal revision

will be sent to clients upon entering the world. Use it to help

testers report bugs.

Send Stats On Join

This directive controls whether the server will send the online player

count to a cilent when it enters the world.

Breathing Setup

If the breathing code is causing problems or you want to run a fun server, you can disable

water checks by enabling this directive.

Default: 1

Speedhack detection

If this directive is turned on, speedhack detection will be activated and speedhackers

will be warned / kicked.

Default: 0

Level Cap

This variable controls the level that stats will be generated up to internally.

Beyond this level players can still see a higher level visually but their stats won’t

increase beyond this point.

Default: 70

Seperate Channels Control

This directive controls whether horde and alliance chats will be seperated across channels.

Set to 1 for blizzlike seperated channels, or 0 to allow horde/alliance to speak to each other

across channels.

Default: 0

Compression Threshold

This directive controls the limit when update packets will be compressed using deflate.

For lower-bandwidth servers use a lower value at the cost of cpu time.

Default: 1000

Queue Update Rate

This directive controls how many milliseconds (ms) between the updates

that the queued players receieve telling them their position in the queue.

Default: 5000 (5 seconds).

Kick AFK Players

Time in milliseconds (ms) that a player will be kicked after they go afk.

Default: 0 (disabled)

Connection Timeout

This directive specifies the amount of seconds that the client will be disconnected

after if no ping packet is sent. It is advised to leave it at the default.

Default: 180

Realm Type

This is the realm type that will be used by the server to handle world pvp.

Default: 0 (pve)(RPPVE)

Other values: 1(pvp)(RPPVP)

AdjustPriority

Set the server to high process priority?

Default: 0

RequireAllSignatures

This directive controls whether the full 10 signatures will be required in order

to turn in a petition. Smaller servers would be better off having it turned off.

Default: off

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Die Directive

If this triggers it means you didn’t read your config file!

Just comment it or remove it when you’ve read this.

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

[SIZE=4][COLOR=Red]<<<DELETE[/COLOR][/SIZE]

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Power regeneration multiplier setup

These directives set up the multiplier in which regen values will be

multiplied by every 2 seconds.

Powers:

Power1 = Mana, Power2 = Rage, Power3 = Energy

Reputation:

Kill = Rep gained on kill, Quest = rep gained from quests

Honor:

Honor = multiplier used to calculate honor per-kill.

PvP:

PvPTimer = in ms, the timeout for pvp after turning it off. default: 5mins (300000)

XP:

The xp that a player receives from killing a creature will be multiplied

by this value in order to get his xp gain.

RestXP:

Value is the amount of rest XP a player will recieve per minute of rest time.

Drop:

This value will be multiplied by any gold looted and the drop percentages of the

items for creatures will also be multiplied for this to determine which items

to drop.

Save:

Value in milliseconds (ms) that will be between player autosaves.

Default: 300000 (5 minutes)

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

GM Client Channel

This should be set to ‘gm_sync_channel’ for the My_Master addon to work.

Default: gm_sync_channel

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Terrain Configuration

Set the path to the map_xx.bin files and whether unloading should be enabled

for the main world maps here. Unloading the main world maps when they go idle

can save a great amount of memory if the cells aren’t being activated/idled

often. Instance/Non-main maps will not be unloaded ever.

Default:

MapPath = “maps”

UnloadMaps = 1

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Log Settings

Cheaters:

This directive sets up the cheater logging file, if turned on any

cheat / packet exploit / speedhack attempts will be logged here.

GMCommands:

These two directives set up the GM command logging fie. If turned on,

most gm commands will be logged for this file for abuse investigation, etc.

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Mail System Setup

These directives control the limits and behaviour of the ingame mail system.

All options must have Mail prefixed before them.

ReloadDelay

Controls the delay at which the database is “refreshed”. Use it if you’re

inserting mail from an external source, such as a web-based interface.

0 turns it off.

Default: 0

DisablePostageCostsForGM

Enables/disables the postage costs for GM’s. DisablePostageCosts overrides this.

Default: 1

DisablePostageCosts

Disables postage costs for all players.

Default: 0

DisablePostageDelayItems

Disables the one hour wait time when sending mail with items attached.

Default: 1

DisableMessageExpiry

Turns off the 30 day / 3 day after read message expiry time.

WARNING: A mailbox still cannot show more than 50 items at once

(stupid limitation in client).

Default: 0

EnableInterfactionMail

Removes the faction limitation for sending mail messages. Applies to all players.

Default: 1

EnableInterfactionMailForGM

Removes the faction limitation for sending mail messages, but only applies

to GM’s. EnableInterfactionMail overrides this.

Default: 1

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Status Dumper Config

These directives set up the status dumper plugin. Filename is an

absolute or relative path to the server binary. Interval is the

time that the stats will be dumped to xml.

Default: stats.xml / 120000 (2 minutes)

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Startup Options

Preloading

This directive controls whether the entire world will be spawned at server

startup or on demand. It is advised to leave it disabled unless you are a

developer doing testing.

Default: off

Background Loot Loading

This directive controls whether loot will be loaded progressively during

startup or in the background in a seperate thread. Turning it on will

result in much faster startup times.

Default: on

Multithreaded Startup

This controls whether the server will spawn multiple worker threads to

use for loading the database and starting the server. Turning it on

increases the speed at which it starts up for each additional cpu in your

computer.

Default: on

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

LogonServer Setup

DisablePings

This directive controls whether pings will be sent to the logonserver to check

if the connection is still “alive”. Expect problems if it is disabled.

Default: 0

RemotePassword

This directive controls the password used to authenticate with the logonserver.

It must be the same between the two configs. If it is not, your server will

not register.

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

Die Directive

If this triggers it means you didn’t read your config file!

Just comment it or remove it when you’ve read this.

#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#

[SIZE=4][COLOR=Red]<<<DELETE[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: A Proper wow server ~ WOrld of warcraft private server ~ Antrex

item.title: A Proper wow server ~ WOrld of warcraft private server ~ Antrex
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

i took this from a tutorial i mate of mine wrote it i gave him a hand with all the dumps and mysql , + finding some files so i could post it he said
to save me writing one all most the same just with spelling errors lol

[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5]Downloads:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Julianx’s Repack V2 (Updated)[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Filefront
MegaUpload
Filebeam

This Repack Includes:

  1. Rev 707 (named it Julianx’s Repack)
  2. sql Files[INDENT]
    a) TNPS7 DB (updated)
    b) Black Temple loot Updates
    c) Frosthold WoW GM armor sets
    d) Custom Shops 2.5
    e) Missing Rev7 Items
    f) Portals for all main cities
    g) Missing Tables
    [/INDENT]3. DBC
  3. Map Extractor (instructions on use inside)
  4. Ecko Tools
  5. Script_bin
  6. exe’s
  7. .Conf Files

[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Cool CMS V.1.1 (JulianX Images)[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Filebeam
MegaUpload
Filefront

[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]MySQL and SQLyog[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Filefront
MegaUpload
Filebeam

File Details:

  1. MySQL 5.0.4
  2. SQLyog 6.04
    [COLOR=YellowGreen]
    [SIZE=3]All In 1 Pack[/SIZE][/COLOR]
    MegaUpload

All in 1 Pack Details:

  1. Julianx’s Repack (updated)
  2. Cool CMS V.1.1 (JulianX Images)
  3. MySQL and SQLyog

[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5]Extra Downloads[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Hyjal/BT Updates/fixes:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Filebeam
MegaUpload
Filefront

[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Fix Pack V1[/SIZE][/COLOR]
Filebeam
Filefront

Fix Details
2.2. Patch Items
Azuremyst Isle HP/MP fix
A threat Within Quest Fix
Blade Esdge Mountains Quest ID’s fix

All in 1 Details
All of the fixes in Fix Pack V1 but in all together in 1 sql file.
[COLOR=Orange][SIZE=2]NOTE: this is important at about the nd your PC will freeze and slow down, do not think there is a problem. This SQL file takes about 10 minutes to execute, but it is worth it.[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5]Map Extracting:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]

  1. Open Julianx’s Repack-Image
  2. Select and open the file
    “map_extractor”-Image
  3. select ad.exe-Image
  4. Open up WoW directory folder and put ad.exe in there-Image
  5. Create a new Folder in your WoW Folder…Image
  6. Name the folder “maps”-Image
  7. This is what the layout SHOULD look like-Image
  8. Open the maps file…as you can see it is empty atm, so go back to the WoW folder-Image
  9. When back in WoW folder start up the ad.exe, it should look like this when started.-Image
  10. Now when it finishes, the exe will disappear and you might think you have had an error, but you prolly didn’y, you did if it disspeared within 30 seconds cuz this process should take about 5 minutes.
  11. Now open up your “maps” folder in your WoW directory, and you will see a bunch of map documents like in the pic.-Image
  12. Now that this is all done put the “maps” folder into the folder called “Julianx’s repack”, which will look like this when put in.-Image

[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=DarkOrange][SIZE=5]Server Set-up Guide:[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Yellow]===================================[/COLOR]
[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Step 1: Setting up MySQL[/SIZE][/COLOR]

  1. Open the MySQL 5.0.41 Essentials installer and click “Next”-Image
  2. Choose “Typical” and click “Next”-Image
  3. Click “Install”-Image
  4. After installation, click “Next” twice, till the last tab of this wizard.-Image
  5. Check the option “Configure the MySQL Server now” and click “Finish”-Image
  6. Just click “Next”-Image
  7. Choose “Standard Configuration” and click “Next”-Image
  8. Check the options “Install As Windows Service” and “Launch the MySQL Service automatically”, then click “Next”-Image
  9. Check “Modify Security Settings” and create a password, then click “Next”-Image
  10. Just click “Execute”-Image
  11. Check that everything gone well and then click "Finish"Image

[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Step 2: Setting up SQLyog[/SIZE][/COLOR]

  1. Start the SQLyog Comunity 6.04 installer and click “Next”-Image
  2. Check “I accept the terms in the License Agreement”, then click “Next”-Image
  3. Select your favorite options, then click “Next”-Image
  4. Choose a folder, then click “Install”-Image
  5. Wait until the setup is completed succesfully, then click “Next”-Image
    6)Check “Run SQLyog Comunity 6.04” and click “Finish”-Image
  6. Just click “Continue…”-Image
  7. Fill the Password cell with your MySQL root password (the password is the one you used during MySQL 5.0.41 Essentials configuration), then click “Connect”-Image
  8. Agree and save your password in SQLyog connection manager-Image
  9. Right click on “root@localhost” and select “Create Database…”-Image
  10. Put “antrix” (without quotes) and click “Create”-Image
  11. Right click on “antrix” and select “Restore From SQL Dump…”-Image
  12. Browse your “sql” folder and select the database “TNPS7”. Click “Open” then “Execute”-
    Image 1
    Image 2
    [COLOR=Orange][SIZE=2]NOTE: This will not take as long as other DB’s it will be ready in 1-3 minutes tops.[/SIZE][/COLOR]
  13. Again, Right click on “antrix” and select “Restore From SQL Dump…”-Image
  14. Browse your “sql” folder and select the file “Missing Tables.sql”. Click “open” then “Execute” Image 1
    Image 2
  15. When the import is completed successfully, click “Close”-Image
  16. Click on “Refresh Object Browser” , then select “accounts” table in your “antrix” database. Now click on “Table Data” and you will see your “accounts” table data.
    Image 1 Image 2 Image 3
  17. Fill the cells to whatever you want your acct to be. To make TBC go to very end of cells and change the flags to 8. To make self GM enter “az” into the GM cell. then click “Save Changes”-Image
  18. Close SQLyog Comunity
    6.04-Image

[COLOR=YellowGreen][SIZE=3]Step 3: Config Files[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Change all Written in [COLOR=Red]red[/COLOR], to your info.
